title: Flow Control Function Block
description: This function block is designed to manage flow control based on the provided input signals. It handles multiple logical states, manages a timer for delays, and sets output signals accordingly.
name: FLOW_CONTROL

input.name: IN
input.description: Input boolean signal that influences the flow control.

input.name: REQ
input.description: Request boolean signal that triggers the timing and operations.

input.name: ENQ
input.description: Enquiry boolean signal that enables or disables certain operations.

input.name: RST
input.description: Reset signal that clears the state of the function block.

input.name: T_AUTO
input.description: The automatic timing duration for the timer, defaulting to 60 minutes.

input.name: T_DELAY
input.description: The delay duration applied after the automatic timing, defaulting to 1380 minutes.

output.name: Q
output.description: Output boolean signal that indicates the state of the flow control.

output.name: STATUS
output.description: Status code reflecting the current state of the function block.
